title: Dazzling Diamond Drops: The 'Aabharana Kiran' Earrings
materials: 18k Rose Gold with Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Features a premium Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster.
features: These earrings showcase a contemporary wavy design, embellished with expertly set brilliant-cut diamonds. The delicate form elegantly dangles, catching the light with every movement. The unique pattern adds a modern twist to classic elegance. Secure and comfortable post-and-butterfly closure.
colors: Rose gold metal complemented by the dazzling brilliance of white diamonds.
occasions: or as an elegant everyday statement piece. Can also be worn to modern family events
description: A seamless blend of modern aesthetics and timeless elegance. The rose gold provides a warm, feminine touch, while the brilliant-cut diamonds add a luxurious sparkle. Crafted with precision and attention to detail in Hyderabad, reflecting superior craftsmanship. A versatile piece that transitions effortlessly from day to night.
